text: Found it: the key is `activityType` not `hs_activity_type` to set under `engagement` fields instead of `metadata`

Hey everyone! If anyone has knowledge about custom workflows, we would love to hear your ideas for this problem. Thanks!

<https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/APIs-Integrations/Remove-option-for-merge-fields-on-custom-workflow-action/m-p/403272#M39930>
Yup, even when I included the term param it still gives me no result.
